comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: When he left Major League baseball, he played for the minor league Minneapolis Millers of the American Association from 1911 to 1914. After his baseball career, which was hampered by constant leg injuries, Clymer became a car dealer. He died at age 50 from an automobile accident in St. Paul, MN. He is interred at Willow River Cemetery in Hudson, WI en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Otis_Clymer
